code: import React,{useEffect,useRef,useState}from"react";import{searchCities}from"../services/weather";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function SearchCity(_ref){let{onSelect}=_ref;const[q,setQ]=useState("");const[results,setResults]=useState([]);const[open,setOpen]=useState(false);const timer=useRef();useEffect(()=>{clearTimeout(timer.current);timer.current=setTimeout(async()=>{try{const data=await searchCities(q,8);setResults(data);setOpen(data.length>0);}catch(_unused){setResults([]);setOpen(false);}},300);return()=>clearTimeout(timer.current);},[q]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-wrap",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"input",placeholder:"Buscar",value:q,onChange:e=>setQ(e.target.value),onFocus:()=>results.length&&setOpen(true)}),open&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"dropdown",children:results.map(r=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"option",onMouseDown:()=>{onSelect({name:r.label,latitude:r.latitude,longitude:r.longitude});setQ(r.label);setOpen(false);},children:r.label},r.id))})]});}
